elements.text: (well, at least in azure pipelines you can see it, of course on github actions they don't show it to you)

text: the `actions/checkout` step shows it in the log.  for example: <https://github.com/JuliaLang/Pkg.jl/runs/1872782304?check_suite_focus=true#step:3:446>  commit: <https://github.com/JuliaLang/Pkg.jl/commit/01c68de9db028ed133cabf24845dbf5e253387ab>  this is the merge commit of the PR.  and it shows it's checking out `refs/remotes/pull/2383/merge`
